description: Sunfinity 50.75 WP is a post-emergence herbicide with both contact and residual activity for controlling broadleaf weeds and some grasses in wheat.
side_effect: May cause skin and eye irritation. It is recommended to wear protective gear during application. Avoid inhalation of spray mist.
crops_pests: Wheat weeds: C.album, P.heterophylla, A. viritus, P. oleracea
